title: Oru Megham Lyrics Ishtam Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer(s): MLR Karthikeyan, Divya
Song: Oru Megham
Movie: Ishtam
Music by : Thaman S

Naan indru naanai illai, yen endru ketkiren
Nee indri pona naatkal, veen endru solkiren (2)

Oru megham illaamal
oru saaral illaamal
muludhaaga dhegam ninaikinrene naane
Vizhudhaaga kaatril aadum vazhkai dhaane

Oru vaarthai illaamal
oru osai illaamal 
oru paadal ondru paaadi vandhen naane
Idhu paadhi sorgam, paadhi naragam thaane

Poi solli katrukonden 
naakoosa villaye
Mun pola unnaal indru 
naan pesa villaye (2)

Oru vaarthai illaamal
oru osai illaamal 
oru paadal ondru paaadi vandhen naane
Idhu paadhi sorgam, paadhi naragam thaane

Oru thaeneeril naan kaanaadha 
suvai un peril unardhene
Unnai paarthaale en melaadai
sari seidhene adhanaale enna maayamo

Porukku povadhu pol thoongida selkiren
Peruku kannai moodi verodho seikiren

Aalillaa theevukulle naan indru pogiren
Aaanaalum kaadhil yedho sangeedham ketkiren

Oru vaarthai illaamal
oru osai illaamal 
oru paadal ondru paaadi vandhen naane
Idhu paadhi sorgam, paadhi naragam thaane

Vazhi theriyaadha mozhi puriyaadha
oru siruvan pol nadandhene
Ada idhuthaano idhu adhu dhaano
enna adayaalam theriyaamal naanum nindrene

Thevaiku mele ingae thaen thuli sottudhe
Kai theendum dhooram vandhu vanamdhan muttudhe
Noorodu nootronrai ennaatkal ponadhe
Verodu maari indru veredho aagudhe

Dheemthana naagerey 
dheem dheem thana naagerey

idhu paadhi sorgam paadhi naragamdhaane ..
